item.title: CVE-2024-39436|2024-10-09T06:43:27.037Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- sc7731e%2Fsc9832e%2Fsc9863a%2Ft310%2Ft606%2Ft612%2Ft616%2Ft610%2Ft618%2Ft760%2Ft770%2Ft820%2Fs8000
